Made a quick CZ-9 Model
Very nice!

Made a quick CZ-9 Model

http://i.imgur.com/0v6OSwl.png

I want it, will be happy to test it.

The rocket should have a total mass of 2640 tons, and a payload to LKO of 83.2 tons. The main stage engines need thrust of about 4250 KN each.

And the boosters are SRB's.
When you finish this, if the Martian movie is out by then, someone should definitely make a Martian mod.

When you finish this, if the Martian movie is out by then, someone should definitely make a Martian mod.
The supply ship would probably go with this, and the Delta IX is probably just SLS. I suppose that the rovers would be interesting, but things with wheels will be broken by 1.1.

Remember, there will be a lot of polishing. Thanks for the model, and I think the boosters are Actualy liquid. If not, let's still do that

- - - Updated - - -

And I think this is the delta IX: a 6 clustered delta iv heavy http://imgur.com/ptOybBl

Remember, there will be a lot of polishing. Thanks for the model, and I think the boosters are Actualy liquid. If not, let's still do that

- - - Updated - - -

And I think this is the delta IX: a 6 clustered delta iv heavy http://imgur.com/ptOybBl

No, boosters are definitely solid.

And I do like that Delta IX, but considering that Launchers Pack is soon going to have a Delta IV I say that CZ-5 and CZ-9 should be focused on.

CZ-2F, Chang'e probes, etc. would be good too. Sizes should be adapted to fit with the Tantares Shenzhou, so a 5m CZ-9, 3.75m CZ-5, and 1.875m CZ-2F would be good size ranges.

The entire point of this mod is to recreate Taiyang Shen, let's stick to that for now. And boosters I'll make

- - - Updated - - -

And I like the sizing idea
Much hype on this thread
Looks good triston, though why don't you make your own thread and post your stuff there? And you should use edgesplit modifier with the smooth shading.

Looks good triston, though why don't you make your own thread and post your stuff there? And you should use edgesplit modifier with the smooth shading.

It also looks like he is making the models with 32 faces, where as most other mods (aswell as stock) use 24 sides for the model and 12 for the colliders.

From what I saw when he was streaming, he does the smoothing in Unity.

It also looks like he is making the models with 32 faces, where as most other mods (aswell as stock) use 24 sides for the model and 12 for the colliders.

From what I saw when he was streaming, he does the smoothing in Unity.

Really? triston, you should reduce the number of faces to 24, really, you'll get ugly rims when attaching the 32 faces part to a stock part. I'm using 24 faces for SELV too. Well, as far as smoothing is concerned, alright then, I am happy to know how to make a heat animation in Unity!
